page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JAMES
page.content: After a breakfast of cereals, I either cycle to{school}or my mother takes me in the car. When I arrive in the {playground}I usually play "circle circle" with my friends. In this game, there are two semi_circles; one person is named to be "it" and the idea is to run from one area to the other with out being caught. In the morning in our classroom we mainly do writing and mathematics. Breaktime is at 10_30 a.m. and we have dinner at 12 noon. In the afternoons we often work on projects although some days we watch television, have swimming, do athletics or rounders. After school, I usually have a game of snooker with my younger brother. Sometimes I play cricket with my friends.
